title: 062: Poliwhirl
author: Chris Taylor
description:
Poliwhirl walks…really well…He hypnotizes his foes while walking….on thing you know there is Poliwhirl the next you’re waking up with lube all over your face…you’ve been warned.

Hosts: [Chris](https://twitter.com/DaLiquidSword),  [Mark](https://www.twitch.tv/robobobatron), Dan

For more episodes and the full ranking list visit [Magmar Sucks](http://www.magmarsucks.com) on the web.

For more on the Pokemon in this episode check out their [Bulbapedia page](http://bulbapedia.bulbagarden.net/wiki/Poliwhirl)
